About

Printscreen is a Plated^ component. It started as a simple lua script to allow screenshots to be uploaded to a website.

Back then (2007!) when it was called, 'sBlog', we had to jump through a few hoops to get this to work. Ultimately, we settled on the simplest and most obvious method - sending a message containing the screenshot using a Gmail account. This worked with any blogging service that supported email hosting which included Flickr, Blogger and Livejournal.

Printscreen is on Github

Click z to zoom, right arrow and left arrow key to navigate.

_blog_export._blog_post_body: The recently updated MuseScore 4.0 looks and works so much better than it ever did. Samples sound less like midi and closer to a representation of someone playing an instrument. Really enjoying the physical squeaks and scrapes of a pizzicato or a reed between 'breaths'. Or possibly I am imagining these things!

_blog_export._body:
The recently updated MuseScore 4.0 looks and works so much better than it ever did. Samples sound less like midi and closer to a representation of someone playing an instrument. Really enjoying the physical squeaks and scrapes of a pizzicato or a reed between 'breaths'. Or possibly I am imagining these things!
shi at Fri 13 Jan 16:14:13 GMT 2023 on lily

_blog_post_json.author: shi
_blog_post_json.title: shi at Fri 13 May 18:51:48 BST 2022 on lily

_blog_export._body:
We're having a grand-opening at FUSE with FUSE. These flyers should hopefully be risoed by tomorrow so they can dry over the weekend!

shi at Fri 13 May 18:51:48 BST 2022 on lily
_blog_export.footer:
About

Printscreen is a Plated^ component. It started as a simple lua script to allow screenshots to be uploaded to a website.

Back then (2007!) when it was called, 'sBlog', we had to jump through a few hoops to get this to work. Ultimately, we settled on the simplest and most obvious method - sending a message containing the screenshot using a Gmail account. This worked with any blogging service that supported email hosting which included Flickr, Blogger and Livejournal.

Printscreen is on Github

Click z to zoom, right arrow and left arrow key to navigate.
